txt.en: You carefully harvest the antlers from this corpse. The extraordinarily large rack of antlers is without blemish and perfectly symmetrical.\n\nSuch a specimen might be of interest to the Rangers of the Grey Company.

'Greetings once more, [placeholder].  What have you found there? Indeed, this is a strange specimen. I have never seen such a large and perfect rack of antlers. And the polished sheen of the ivory? This was borne by no natural creature.\n\n'We have seen many strange things since coming to this place, but always at the edge of our vision. We thought the mysteries but spectres of the imagination. Now I must wonder....'
You found the corpse of one of the mysterious white stags of Enedwaith and harvested its strange antlers.
Talk to a Ranger at Echad Idhrenfair
There are Rangers at Echad Idhrenfair to the north-east of the stag-corpse.\n\nYou should bring the rack of antlers you harvested to one of the Rangers of the Grey Company.
